channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tesla’s robotaxi, energy and storage prospects drive latest ‘buy’ rating
item.description: Benchmark initiates coverage of Tesla with a buy rating and $475 price target.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Tech crash, Powell firing, bond turmoil — these are one firm’s possible, if unlikely, gray swans
item.description: BNP Paribas, took a look at possible extreme scenarios investors should consider for 2025, like a 40% stock drop.

item.title: German elections: When are they, what’s being decided and how that will impact markets
item.description: The election for the 630-seat Bundestag is taking place on Sunday, Feb. 23. It’s happening seven months early after a snap election was agreed.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
